name: The Squeal of the Pig
description:
The CEO of the biggest meat producing corporation is kidnapped by a cannibalistic serial killer that exclusively eats human flesh. The former fears being eaten, but the latter assures him he has other plans for him, including a special surprise.

Will he sit around and wait for the special surprise or fight back and escape?

"The Squeal of the Pig" is a psychological horror game featuring classic 2D pixel graphics.
Gameplay includes elements of survival horror with puzzles and decision-making that affects the plot, ending, and experience.
